abstract: Antonio Di Natale (Italian pronunciation: [anˈtɔnjo di naˈtale]; born 13 October 1977) is an Italian footballer who currently plays for Italian Serie A club Udinese.A versatile striker with a lethal eye for goal, Di Natale can play anywhere in the front line, as a lone striker, or out wide in an attacking trident. He is notable for his technical skills and for his ability to score and create goals. Di Natale earned the prestigious award of being the Serie A Capocannoniere — Serie A's highest goalscorer — for the 2009–10 and 2010–11 seasons.Unusually for a striker, he has enjoyed his most prolific seasons in front of goal well after the age of thirty.

He is notable for his technical skills and for his ability to score and create goals.
